about_the_game:
About This Game
Don't you hate getting phone calls from random people you don't know? I sure do.
But Luka?
Nah, he's got his way of turning a wrong number into a free movie date.



Luka De Castro is a carefree guy, he goes with the flow and tries to make the best of what life throws at him. So when he gets a wrong number call from a stranger in the middle of the night, instead of hanging up straight away he uses his charming personality to convince the stranger to take him to the movies instead of the person they originally intended.

Join Luka as he befriends Xander, and explore the many different types of relationships the pair could have, ranging from just being mates, to becoming friends with benefits, and so much more.



- Aussie Setting: Wrong Number is set in Melbourne, Australia. It makes reference to real world locations and the characters speak with Aussie slang. A handy glossary feature has been included for our international players.

- One Love Interest: One sexy man to get to know and try to win over.

- Diverse Cast: Meet a range of ethnically diverse characters in the LGBTQIA+ community.

- Original Soundtrack: Over 10 amazing original tracks by our talented team of composers.

- Voice Acting: Partial voice acting with an incredible international cast, with our two main characters being voices by Aussie talents, Xuan Vinh Huynh and Thomas G Burt.

content_descriptors.notes:
In this demo, there is one 18+ story route and one SFW route. All 18+ scenes are between two consenting male adults. 

There are a couple of scenes where characters consume alcohol responsibly. 

The characters also swear in casual conversation.

name: Wrong Number Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7.8.10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A short yaoi visual novel set in Australia. Go on a date with a stranger, become friends, or maybe something more... or nothing at all.
